text: Here are the explanations and examples of the 5-point scaling, please read them carefully before moving forward.

choices:
• In this case there may be some changes in e.g. the level of generality. Additionally, one sentence may go into more detail than the other and add additional context, but the findings have mostly the same information

  • Here the two findings have the same information but at different levels of generality:

    1. A link between sugar and diabetes was found

    2. Overconsumption of sugar is associated with the onset of diabetes

  • Here both sentences have the same core finding, but one sentence goes into more detail

    1. Overconsumption of sugar causes diabetes

    2. Experiments demonstrated that overconsumption of sugar led to an increase in blood glucose levels, which over a long enough time period was linked to an increased prevalence of diabetes in the cohort.

  • One finding could support the other

    1. Overconsumption of sugar causes diabetes

    2. Overconsumption of sugar can have negative effects on health
